name: Rowan

skills.name: Slash
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. Damage increases according to SPD.
Damage based on: [ATK] [SPD]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Scourge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Blade Surge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 4 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
